name: Megan Calme
about: Freshman at the University of Kentucky pursuing a Bachelor of Arts in Integrated Strategic Communication. Passionate about event management, videography, and photography, with a strong background in leadership and digital media design. Currently exploring opportunities in event planning and video production.
skills: Editing with Premiere Pro and iMovie

experience.title: Fedders Construction Intern
experience.description: Assists with event management and video production projects, including video editing and organizational tasks.

experience.description: Provided child and pet care, built relationships with families, and managed household organization and meal preparation.

experience.title: Camp Counselor and Videographer
experience.description: Volunteered as a camp counselor, leading activities and capturing moments with a GoPro to create promotional videos for camp.
